question: Which of the following conditions will not show any Doppler effect?
option1: When source and listener both are at rest
option3: When source and listener are moving in mutually perpendicular directions
explanation: Conditions for no Doppler effect : (i) When source (S) and listener (L) both are at rest. (ii) When medium alone is moving. (iii) When S and L move in such a way that distance between S and L remains constant. (iv) When source S and listener L, are moving in mutually perpendicular directions
